name: Mint Pass Berlin Collection | Loren Bednar

metadata.name: Mint Pass Berlin Collection | Loren Bednar 1/100
metadata.description:
A Mint Pass Berlin Collection (MPBC) allows the holder to mint a limited edition Loren Bednar NFT on April 17, 2022 during the Bright Moments NFT ART Berlin event at Kraftwerk. The Berlin Collection includes 10 curated international generative and digital artists that will each release a collection of 100 pieces across 10 nights at Kraftwerk. 

We prefer collectors to mint IRL in Berlin, but surrogate minting is available. More info: https://www.brightmoments.io/berlin.
